empty_state.title: Configure a New Asset
empty_state.description: Assets are the end users of a service.

delete.title: Delete a Asset
delete.description: Deleting this asset will also remove this asset from any associated asset group. This action cannot be reversed.

errors.delete: The asset could not be deleted at this time.
errors.add: Some assets could not be added at this time.
errors.already_added: This asset has already been added to the asset group

info.title: General Information
info.description: General information will help identify and manage added asset.

url.label: URL
url.placeholder: External URL of the asset, like s3://bucket/plugin-a-v1

content.label: Content
content.placeholder: Select an archive file to upload

tags.label: Tags
tags.placeholder: Enter a list of tags separated by comma
tags.tooltip: An optional set of strings associated with the Asset for grouping and filtering.
